mapper.select:
select num, title, writer_id, written_date, content, views, boardnum
from community where boardnum=#{num} and rownum <= 7 ORDER BY num DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into community (num, title, writer_id, written_date, content, views, boardnum)
values(#{num}, #{title}, #{writer_id}, #{written_date}, #{content}, #{views}, #{boardnum})
